creator: SweetMood
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: new improved version Sunflowers Summer. the wishes of users are taken into account. Elimination causes of malfunctions. Bug fixes. Added new quality backgrounds, effects and sounds in the theme of the application Sunflowers Summer.
Sunflowers Summer - simple and beautiful app personolizatsiya your device. The application Sunflowers Summer is ready to decorate the screen of any phone or tablet! The application Sunflowers Summer has a number of advantages - compatibility with almost all devices, does not need for permanent Internet connection, economical battery consumption, simple user interface settings.
Animated unique live wallpaper Sunflowers Summer - implementation of the live wallpaper with realistic effects and excellent graphics. Is free. Personalization.
Sunflowers Summer - This is a cool animated live wallpaper with realistic spectacular effects. Screenshots of Application Sunflowers Summer, display options, and image effects on the screen.
Quick input in the setup by double-tapping the screen. Dual Touch option is disabled in the settings.
Tap the center of the screen and hear the beautiful sound applications. Sounds off and adjusted in the settings.
In the scenario of live wallpaper Sunflowers Summer involved an additional animated National Objects. Animation effects and animation settings, you can change the settings in the corresponding section.
The application Sunflowers Summer realizes the realistic effect of water droplets on the glass. Drops of water or dew flow down the phone's glass. When you touch your finger, the drops realistically fly apart.
The application contains an interactive effect of an extra screen saver - a decorative addition to the background.

Live Wallpaper Sunflowers Summer are working steadily on all common popular models of phones and tablets. New versions of this app out periodically, depending on popularity among users.
If there are any problems in the application, please contact us by Email to the developer. In the present application content advertising.
HOW TO INSTALL Sunflowers Summer:
1. Animated live wallpaper Sunflowers Summer - install.
2. After downloading applications, enable wallpaper via the icon or via the main menu.
3. After activation of the application read it in the open prior preview window. - Run the application on the main screen.

creator: demitron
descriptionHtml:
Summer is joy, it's time, bright shine in your favorite eyes. Summer - you want to go where the sea and the heat. And no cases. The best memories are always connected with the summer. I will never forget this summer!
Sunflowers Summer - simple and beautiful app personolizatsiya your device. Mobile application Sunflowers Summer is perfect for your new smartphone! The application Sunflowers Summer has a number of advantages - full compatibility with 99% of Android-devices, does not need to be connected to the Internet, it is economical to use the battery of the device, it has a very convenient and understandable system of settings.
Sunflowers Summer - Personalization and Entertainment. Animated unique appication Sunflowers Summer - implementation with realistic effects and excellent graphics. Completely free interactive appication. The application Sunflowers Summer is not only the ability to set beautiful and stylish APP Personalization. on the screen, but also the opportunity to get acquainted with the latest applications of our team. The application contains the announcement of the best APP in the relevant topics from the developer.
Sunflowers Summer - nice and simple APP personalization with beautiful effects and animations. Pictures of App Sunflowers Summer will help you deal with the application configuration capabilities.
Referring to twice the screen with your finger, you can open the settings menu. Disabling call option settings by double-tapping in the basic settings.
The application includes a sound - the sound is switched at the touch of the screen center. If desired, you can disable the sound module.
Sunflowers Summer equipped with additional small animations. Animated National Objects installed settings.
The application Sunflowers Summer has the ability to connect - disable the interactive effect of water droplets on the glass. Realistic drops of dew on the screen are scattered over the surface of the glass. Interactive finger tap causes a change in direction.

In the application Sunflowers Summer there is a sparking layer effect - flickering stars and fireflies are scattered randomly around the entire background. Calm and fascinating flicker emphasizes the harmony of the composition of the application.
Sunflowers Summer has been tested and works well on all major models of well known manufacturers of devices. Periodically, the application is updated. New versions are available in the Developer account.
Please send by e-mail your comments on the application - it will improve our work. Application contain advertising units.
Application Sunflowers Summer. INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download to your phone or tablet app Sunflowers Summer.
2. Settings -> programs and applications -> find and activate "Sunflowers Summer"
3. After downloading the app opens in a new window to preview. - Run the application on the main screen.
